product_name: UCLEAR HBC 120+ Snow Helmet Communicator - Single
long_description: The UCLEAR HBC 120+ Snow Helmet communicator syncs with your Bluetooth(R)-enabled phone and reduces ambient noise for crystal-clear conversations and music while you hit the slopes. Listen and wirelessly control your music, make calls using voice commands and communicate with other HBC users. Easy-to-use controls and voice activation allow you to answer or decline calls, toggle through songs and accept 3-way calls without taking off your gloves. High-fidelity speaker with built-in microphone helps ensure clarity even under noisy conditions. Also works as an intercom with other HBC120 units within 10m. Tough weatherproof casing resists snow and dust. Rechargeable lithium-ion battery offers 10 hrs. of talk time, charges in 2 hrs. and functions in temperatures raging from - 4degF to 140degF (-20&3176;C to 60deg). UCLEAR HBC120+ Snow Helmet communicator comes with a USB charging cable, goggles strap accessory, helmet strap accessory, 18 in. extension cord and mic alignment stencils.
